data.title: 12 Puffer St, Lowell, MA 01851
data.meta_description: Zillow has 34 photos of this $534,900 3 beds, 2 baths, 1,752 Square Feet single family home located at 12 Puffer St, Lowell, MA 01851 built in 1900. MLS #73272795.
data.text: Located in the Highlands, this spacious single family features 3BR and an office/den that is currently used as a 4BR. Full bathroom with Jacuzzi in the upstairs, plenty of closets through the house, wood block counters in the kitchen. Laundry located in the second floor for your convenience. Above ground pool and fenced yard. Basement has a lot of great space for storage.
